body.raw:
{
  "name": "Test Show Creation",
  "original_name": "Test Show Creation",
  "first_air_date": "2024-01-15",
  "status": "Returning Series",
  "overview": "A test show for API testing purposes.",
  "seasons": 1,
  "episodes": 10,
  "tmdb_rating": 7.5,
  "creators": ["Test Creator"],
  "country": "US",
  "genres": [1, 2]
}
